channel.title: Just a question, does using the same account for other servers screw it up?
channel.description: please let me know cause i would like to know if thats why my account is messed up and showing things like my mage level as 107/1

item.title: Just a question, does using the same account for other servers screw it up?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

No. That is a glitch of moparscape. The levels you get on one server seem to carry over to the next one you play, even though you don’t actually have those stats on the server you’re playing. The only way to fix this is to restart the client.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a question, does using the same account for other servers screw it up?
